sub_smul_dslope:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
@[simp]
theorem sub_smul_dslope (f : 𝕜 → E) (a b : 𝕜) : «expr • » (b - a) (dslope f a b) = f b - f a := by
  rcases eq_or_ne b a with (rfl | hne) <;> simp [dslope_of_ne, *]
#align sub_smul_dslope sub_smul_dslope
of_dslope:
theorem differentiable_on.of_dslope (h : differentiable_on 𝕜 (dslope f a) s) : differentiable_on 𝕜 f s := fun x hx =>
  (h x hx).of_dslope
#align differentiable_on.of_dslope differentiable_on.of_dslope
eq_on_dslope_sub_smul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᶜ» -/
theorem eq_on_dslope_sub_smul (f : 𝕜 → E) (a : 𝕜) :
    EqOn (dslope (fun x => «expr • » (x - a) (f x)) a) f («expr ᶜ» {a}) := fun b => dslope_sub_smul_of_ne f
#align eq_on_dslope_sub_smul eq_on_dslope_sub_smul
eq_on_dslope_slope:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᶜ» -/
theorem eq_on_dslope_slope (f : 𝕜 → E) (a : 𝕜) : EqOn (dslope f a) (slope f a) («expr ᶜ» {a}) := fun b => dslope_of_ne f
#align eq_on_dslope_slope eq_on_dslope_slope
dslope_sub_smul_of_ne:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem dslope_sub_smul_of_ne (f : 𝕜 → E) (h : b ≠ a) : dslope (fun x => «expr • » (x - a) (f x)) a b = f b := by
  rw [dslope_of_ne _ h, slope_sub_smul _ h.symm]
#align dslope_sub_smul_of_ne dslope_sub_smul_of_ne
dslope_sub_smul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem dslope_sub_smul [decidable_eq 𝕜] (f : 𝕜 → E) (a : 𝕜) :
    dslope (fun x => «expr • » (x - a) (f x)) a = update f a (deriv (fun x => «expr • » (x - a) (f x)) a) :=
  eq_update_iff.2 ⟨dslope_same _ _, eq_on_dslope_sub_smul f a⟩
#align dslope_sub_smul dslope_sub_smul
dslope_same:
/-
Copyright (c) 2022 Yury Kudryashov. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Yury Kudryashov
-/
@[simp]
theorem dslope_same (f : 𝕜 → E) (a : 𝕜) : dslope f a a = deriv f a :=
  update_same _ _ _
#align dslope_same dslope_same
dslope_of_ne:
theorem dslope_of_ne (f : 𝕜 → E) (h : b ≠ a) : dslope f a b = slope f a b :=
  update_noteq h _ _
#align dslope_of_ne dslope_of_ne
dslope_eventually_eq_slope_punctured_nhd:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr =ᶠ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds_within.ne -/
theorem dslope_eventually_eq_slope_punctured_nhds (f : 𝕜 → E) :
    «expr =ᶠ[ ] » (dslope f a) (nhds_within.ne a) (slope f a) :=
  (eq_on_dslope_slope f a).eventually_eq_of_mem self_mem_nhds_within
#align dslope_eventually_eq_slope_punctured_nhds dslope_eventually_eq_slope_punctured_nhds
dslope_eventually_eq_slope_of_ne:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr =ᶠ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
theorem dslope_eventually_eq_slope_of_ne (f : 𝕜 → E) (h : b ≠ a) : «expr =ᶠ[ ] » (dslope f a) ((nhds) b) (slope f a) :=
  (eq_on_dslope_slope f a).eventually_eq_of_mem (is_open_ne.mem_nhds h)
#align dslope_eventually_eq_slope_of_ne dslope_eventually_eq_slope_of_ne
dslope_comp:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →L[ ] » -/
theorem continuous_linear_map.dslope_comp {F : Type _} [normed_add_comm_group F] [normed_space 𝕜 F]
    (f : «expr →L[ ] » E 𝕜 F) (g : 𝕜 → E) (a b : 𝕜) (H : a = b → differentiable_at 𝕜 g a) :
    dslope (f ∘ g) a b = f (dslope g a b) :=
  by
  rcases eq_or_ne b a with (rfl | hne)
  · simp only [dslope_same]
    exact (f.has_fderiv_at.comp_has_deriv_at b (H rfl).has_deriv_at).deriv
  · simpa only [dslope_of_ne _ hne] using f.to_linear_map.slope_comp g a b
#align continuous_linear_map.dslope_comp continuous_linear_map.dslope_comp
differentiable_within_at_dslope_of_ne:
theorem differentiable_within_at_dslope_of_ne (h : b ≠ a) :
    differentiable_within_at 𝕜 (dslope f a) s b ↔ differentiable_within_at 𝕜 f s b :=
  by
  refine' ⟨differentiable_within_at.of_dslope, fun hd => _⟩
  refine'
    (((differentiable_within_at_id.sub_const a).inv (sub_ne_zero.2 h)).smul (hd.sub_const (f a))).congr_of_eventually_eq
      _ (dslope_of_ne _ h)
  refine' (eq_on_dslope_slope _ _).eventually_eq_of_mem _
  exact mem_nhds_within_of_mem_nhds (is_open_ne.mem_nhds h)
#align differentiable_within_at_dslope_of_ne differentiable_within_at_dslope_of_ne
differentiable_on_dslope_of_nmem:
theorem differentiable_on_dslope_of_nmem (h : a ∉ s) : differentiable_on 𝕜 (dslope f a) s ↔ differentiable_on 𝕜 f s :=
  forall_congr' fun x => forall_congr' fun hx => differentiable_within_at_dslope_of_ne <| ne_of_mem_of_not_mem hx h
#align differentiable_on_dslope_of_nmem differentiable_on_dslope_of_nmem
differentiable_at_dslope_of_ne:
theorem differentiable_at_dslope_of_ne (h : b ≠ a) : differentiable_at 𝕜 (dslope f a) b ↔ differentiable_at 𝕜 f b := by
  simp only [← differentiable_within_at_univ, differentiable_within_at_dslope_of_ne h]
#align differentiable_at_dslope_of_ne differentiable_at_dslope_of_ne
continuous_within_at_dslope_of_ne:
theorem continuous_within_at_dslope_of_ne (h : b ≠ a) :
    continuous_within_at (dslope f a) s b ↔ continuous_within_at f s b :=
  by
  refine' ⟨continuous_within_at.of_dslope, fun hc => _⟩
  simp only [dslope, continuous_within_at_update_of_ne h]
  exact
    ((continuous_within_at_id.sub continuous_within_at_const).inv₀ (sub_ne_zero.2 h)).smul
      (hc.sub continuous_within_at_const)
#align continuous_within_at_dslope_of_ne continuous_within_at_dslope_of_ne
continuous_on_dslope:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
theorem continuous_on_dslope (h : s ∈ (nhds) a) :
    continuous_on (dslope f a) s ↔ continuous_on f s ∧ differentiable_at 𝕜 f a :=
  by
  refine' ⟨fun hc => ⟨hc.of_dslope, continuous_at_dslope_same.1 <| hc.continuous_at h⟩, _⟩
  rintro ⟨hc, hd⟩ x hx
  rcases eq_or_ne x a with (rfl | hne)
  exacts[(continuous_at_dslope_same.2 hd).continuous_within_at, (continuous_within_at_dslope_of_ne hne).2 (hc x hx)]
#align continuous_on_dslope continuous_on_dslope
continuous_at_dslope_same:
@[simp]
theorem continuous_at_dslope_same : continuous_at (dslope f a) a ↔ differentiable_at 𝕜 f a := by
  simp only [dslope, continuous_at_update_same, ← has_deriv_at_deriv_iff, has_deriv_at_iff_tendsto_slope]
#align continuous_at_dslope_same continuous_at_dslope_same
continuous_at_dslope_of_ne:
theorem continuous_at_dslope_of_ne (h : b ≠ a) : continuous_at (dslope f a) b ↔ continuous_at f b := by
  simp only [← continuous_within_at_univ, continuous_within_at_dslope_of_ne h]
#align continuous_at_dslope_of_ne continuous_at_dslope_of_ne
